name: Belgian Horticulture Society
obverse: Bust of Rembert Dodoens facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: REMB. DODONÉE, NÉ À MALINES, EN 1518.
reverse: A rectangular frame enclosing a rake, spade, and watering can. The frame is surrounded by flowers and vegetables.
references: American Journal of Numismatics, Volumes 38, 1903: p. 13 #1936
description: Rembert Dodoens (29 June 1517 – 10 March 1585) was a Flemish physician and botanist.
